Class Frame

java.lang.Object
uk.ac.keele.csc20004.robots.parts.AbstractRobotPart
uk.ac.keele.csc20004.robots.parts.Frame
All Implemented Interfaces:
RobotPart
Direct Known Subclasses:
Chassis, Torso
public abstract class Frame extends AbstractRobotPart
This class implements RobotPart, but is abstract. Its only purpose is to provide a definition for a frame as a type (different from Motor, Sensor or Actuator) that can be further instantiated.
Author:
marcoortolani
